Title: Permits consent for service in the form of magnetic tape or through electronic means for certain collection procedures
Summary: Permits consent for service in the form of magnetic tape or through electronic means for certain collection procedures by the sheriff's office or an officer or employee of the department of taxation and finance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to permitting consent for service in the form of magnetic tape or through electronic means for certain collection procedures
